title: Missing Emails
content: My inbox is entirely empty, it used to have backups of emails from another of my accounts. Please advise.

title: disappeared tags
content: Hello, I don't know where the mistake is, but it has already happened to me twice that I put "tags" on my emails throughout the year and it just deleted them. After turning it on, I no longer had those "tags" for emails. I put tags for orders with a large number so that I can sort them right away, and when I delete them, it's a lot of work to sort those orders. Can you tell me where the error is?
creator: michal.fujak

title: thunderbird android storage location
content:
my internal storage (64GB) is almost full I would like to use my internal sd-card storage (256GB) as storage location for my email profile folder.

Is it possible ?

phone RedmiNote 8 Pro Android 11 MIUI Global 12.5.8
creator: regdmslink
